title: Goodbye wordpress.com
body:
Today I migrated all of my blog posts (all 7 of them! lol) from wordpress.com to my new simple static website hosted by github pages.
For this, I have used my very own HAM framework to stitch together a 2-page website. 

### Page 1: Index
This is the home page that shows links to all my posts with a couple of links to my online presence.

### Page 2. Read
This page pulls content of the post from static json files hosted within the same website

For now, this should allow me get my posts out easily. I'm sure over time I will keep adding bits and pieces to improve
the user experience
